alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Otero, northeastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Higbee, or 23 miles south of North La Junta, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Otero, northeastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
